title: Zone Lockdown
description: Zone Lockdown allows you to restrict access to URLs in a zone to specific IP addresses and IP address ranges.
cfExtendedDescription: The URLs configured in a Zone Lockdown rule support wildcard matching on the domain or path.

links.title: Get Zone Lockdown rules
links.description: Fetches Zone Lockdown rules. You can filter the results using several optional parameters.

per_page.description: The maximum number of results per page. You can only set the value to `1` or to a multiple of 5 such as `5`, `10`, `15`, or `20`.

description.description: A string to search for in the description of existing rules.

created_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was created.

modified_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was last modified.

uri.description: A single URI to search for in the list of URLs of existing rules.

ip.description: A single IP address to search for in existing rules.

ip_range.description: A single IP address range to search for in existing rules.

priority.description: The priority of the rule to control the processing order. A lower number indicates higher priority. If not provided, any rules with a configured priority will be processed before rules without a priority.

links.title: Create a Zone Lockdown rule
links.description: Creates a new Zone Lockdown rule.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/lockdowns" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"paused":false,"description":"Restrict access to these endpoints to requests from a known IP address","urls":["api.mysite.com/some/endpoint*"],"configurations":[{"target":"ip","value":"198.51.100.4"}]}'

paused.description: When true, indicates that the rule is currently paused.

description.example: "Restrict access to these endpoints to requests from a known IP address"
description.description: An informative summary of the rule.

urls.description: The URLs to include in the rule definition. You can use wildcards. Each entered URL will be escaped before use, which means you can only use simple wildcard patterns.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip_range` when specifying an IP address range in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

configurations.description: A list of IP addresses or CIDR ranges that will be allowed to access the URLs specified in the Zone Lockdown rule. You can include any number of `ip` or `ip_range` configurations.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip_range` when specifying an IP address range in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

links.title: Get a Zone Lockdown rule
links.description: Fetches the details of a Zone Lockdown rule.

links.title: Update a Zone Lockdown rule
links.description: Updates an existing Zone Lockdown rule.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/lockdowns/372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"paused":false,"description":"Restrict access to these endpoints to requests from a known IP address","urls":["api.mysite.com/some/endpoint*"],"configurations":[{"target":"ip","value":"198.51.100.4"}]}'

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

configurations.description: A list of IP addresses or CIDR ranges that will be allowed to access the URLs specified in the Zone Lockdown rule. You can include any number of `ip` or `ip_range` configurations.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip_range` when specifying an IP address range in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

links.title: Delete a Zone Lockdown rule
links.description: Deletes an existing Zone Lockdown rule.

cfLinkErrors.10002: lockdown rule not unique (edit the existing rather than adding a new)
cfLinkErrors.10015: Patch value not valid for given context

id.description: The unique identifier of the Zone Lockdown rule.

created_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was created.

modified_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was last modified.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the rule is currently paused.

object_definition.title: Zone Lockdown
object_definition.description: Zone Lockdown allows you to restrict access to URLs in a zone to specific IP addresses and IP address ranges.
